column2: "The are the gist of the strict regulations from within ARKS..."
"[Once the specified conditions are met, free exploration of the seabed area of Wopal will be allowed.]"
"By getting good grades in training, you can increase the degree of your freedom as ARKS."
"You'll eventually be able to freely visit various places, to which I hope you'll be able to perform this well."
"And of course, I'm sure you'll understand its meaning and value. Now it's up to you to accept them or not."
